Tap_Type_and_Enter.name: Tap_Type_and_Enter
Tap_Type_and_Enter.description: Tap an input box at position (x, y), Type the "text", and then perform the Enter operation. Very useful for searching and sending messages!
Tap_Type_and_Enter.precondition: There is a text input box on the screen with no previously entered content.

Refine_Search_Query.name: Refine_Search_Query
Refine_Search_Query.description: Tap on the search bar at position (x, y), type the 'text' to refine the search query, and press Enter to update the results.
Refine_Search_Query.precondition: The search bar is visible and tappable on the current screen.
